metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40150 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by Out of memory. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
